document.full_text: two iraqi men living as refugees in bowling green tried to send sniper rifles, stinger missiles and money to al qaeda in their home country, court documents unsealed tuesday said.
document.title: south: kentucky: plot to ship weapons is alleged
lines_and_colors: two iraqi men living as refugees in bowling green tried to send sniper rifles, stinger missiles and money to al qaeda in their home country, court documents unsealed tuesday said.
